explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning to classify implant defect types with high accuracy.
explanations.classification: The research involves classifying different types of defects (loosening, vertical cracks, and horizontal cracks) using machine learning techniques.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper uses PCA (principal component analysis) as part of the machine learning pipeline to analyze and classify defects.
explanations.neural network: The study employs a two-layer feed-forward neural network with three hidden neurons to achieve high classification accuracy.
